Dating: 25TH DYNASTY AND CONTEMPORARIES (not before); 26TH DYNASTY (not after)
Name: Head of male statue
Description: Head of male statue. The horizontal break is underneath the chin; part of the neck has been preserved. Nose, mouth and chin have suffered damage. The mouth has thick lips but is now very rubbed in the middle. The corners of the mouth, slanting upwards, have been drilled. The wig has not been polished.
